title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 195-5.3 - Authorization and notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 195-5.3 - Authorization and notification

State Regulations

Any authorizations, notices, responses, replies or
determinations required to be given under this Part may be given in writing or
through email or other electronic means. Statements given to an employee shall
use ordinary language readily understood and shall appear in a font size no
smaller than a 12-point font. The employer shall keep a record of any such
authorization for at least six years after such employee's employment
ends. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
195-5.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
